```{r}
#| label: printing-factions
#| echo: false

wrap_li <- function(text = "text", fa = "fas fa-graduation-cap") {
  li <- paste0("<li><i class='fa-li ", fa, "'></i>", text, "</li>\n")
  return(li)
}

print_list <- function(text = "text", fa = "fas fa-graduation-cap") {
  open_ul  <- "<ul class='ul-edu fa-ul'>"
  close_ul <- "</ul>"
  items    <- wrap_li(text, fa)

  cat(paste0(open_ul, "\n"), items, paste0("\n", close_ul))
}

```

# Bio

I am a PhD student in Applied Economics at the University of Minnesota. Originally from Japan, I moved to the U.S. in 2019 to pursue my interest in environmental and natural resource economics. My research focuses on water resource economics, particularly groundwater management and its implications for agricultural production, as well as the economic impacts of climate change.

<br>

### Interests
- Environmental and natural resource economics
- Economics of water resources
- Technology Adoption and Diffusion
- Agricultural production economics

<br>
